about_the_game:
The witch Rolldilocks has broken into the home of the three bears and teleported it away with her magic! But the bears don't give up, and they'll chase her down and make her pay!

In this cute but tough 2D platformer, switch between 3 characters at the press of a button to change how fast you move, how high you jump, and interact with the environment in different ways!

Unique 3-Character Platformer

Baby Bear, Mama Bear, and Papa Bear will have to work together, utilizing each bear's abilities to tackle the various obstacles they encounter. Float on the wind and squeeze through tunnels as Baby Bear, jump over thorn bushes as Mama Bear, and smash through stone blocks as Papa Bear!

Fifty Levels Across Five Worlds

To get Rolldilocks, the bears will have to have to make their way through the Meadow, across the Too Hot Desert, over the Too Cold Mountain, and other themed worlds, each filled with devious obstacles that present unique challenges!

Speedrunning and Special Challenges

Beating each level is just the beginning: Reaching the end fast enough will award you a Gold Star, and somewhere in each level there's a bowl of porridge to collect. Getting all of these will be much trickier than just beating the levels, and will require mastery of the game's mechanics!

Leaderboards and Achievements

Compete with your friends and players around the world by improving your time on each level to rise up the leaderboards, and earn Steam Achievements as you 100% the game!
